title: Cannot tender Add C if todays date is before the Rule 5 Draft Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND the system date for  "Rule 5 draft" is set to a future date
AND Add C's default/create for next year
custom_steps: WHEN I attempt to tender an Add C
custom_expected:
THEN I should receieve an hard error:
Addendum C's may only be tendered after the Rule 5 draft [date from system values]

title: Display a new widget called "Salary Structures" that should be positioned under the Add C widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the homepage
custom_steps: WHEN I view the dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN I should see a new widget called SALARY STRUCTURES under the Add C Widget
AND there are no filters on this widget except global quick filter box
AND salary column data and table header should be right aligned
AND the widget columns will include : LABEL, DATE MODIFIED, ONE COLUMN PER LEVEL OF PLAY listed here
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2346561?projectId=14044

title: Default population for this widget is all of the salary structures previously saved  by clubs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the SALARY STRUCTURES Widget
custom_steps: WHEN I view this widget
custom_expected:
THEN I should see that the default population is all of the salary structures saved by clubs previously
AND if there are none saved, then show No results found

title: The default sort on this column is by Date modified with most recent at the top
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN I view the salary structures widget
custom_expected: THEN the default sort on this widget will be on 'Date modified' column, showing the most recent at the top

title: Widget must have all global features working - maximise, refresh, export, sorting
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: AND can view the salary structures widget
custom_expected:
THEN all global capabilities must be working such as :
-Maximize, Minimize
-Refresh the widget
-Exporting the widget to PDF/Excel
-Sorting other columns on the widget

title: All club users with permissions to that widget will see the same list of salary structures
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a club
custom_steps:
WHEN I view the salary structures widget
AND I have the same permissions to view the widget
custom_expected: THEN I will see the same list of salary structures

title: Verify Wireframe
custom_expected:
**Wireframe**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=view_salary_structures

title: Verify business rule 19.12
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND a player has MJ contract with a Paragraph 2 salary (user can create one by editing the MJ of a player while logged in as club-lrd-mjc-admin password same as username and change statuses)
AND MJ contract is Submitted, Ready for Signature or higher upto and including Approved
custom_steps:
WHEN I enter the salary for his MN contract
AND I enter a (non-zero) value for any level of play that is less than (P2 amount from MJC / # of days in the season) X 30
AND I tender that Add C
custom_expected: THEN for each level of play that is lower, show hard error " The salary for level of play [levels of play] cannot be less than the Player's monthly Paragraph 2 salary in his Major league contract"

title: Verify business rule 19.13
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND a player has MJ contract with a Paragraph 2 salary (user can create one by editing the MJ of a player while logged in as club-nyy-mjc-admin, password same as username)
AND MJ contract is Submitted, Ready for Signature or higher upto and including Approved
custom_steps:
WHEN I enter the salary for his MN contract
AND I enter a (non-zero) value for any level of play that is greater than (P2 amount from MJC / # of days in the season) X 30
AND I tender that Add C
custom_expected: THEN for each level of play that is higher, show soft error/warning:The salary for level of play [level of play] is higher than the Player's monthly Paragraph 2 salary in his Major league contract

title: Introduce a new widget titled "Signatories & Negotiators"
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks E-Sig tab
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a new widget titled "Signatories and Negotiators"
AND the default population for this widget will be a list of signatories entered by logged in ORG
AND Logged in Club A, cannot see Club B's data

title: Widget should have columns as follows
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN I view the Signatories widget
custom_expected:
THEN the default sort should on the Last Name Column
AND I should be able to see the following columns:
Last Name
First Name
Title
Updated
Mj UPC
MN UPC
Add C
Negot

title: Verify Name column is frozen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN I view the signatories widget
custom_expected: THEN the Name column should be frozen (cannot be removed/edited)

title: Checkmarks are the global green checkmark
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN I view the Signatories widget
custom_expected: THEN the checkmarks shown should be the global green checkmarks (see wireframe)

title: Verify Wireframe
custom_expected: http://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=authorized_signatory_negotiator

title: Verify global features
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN I view the signatories widget
custom_expected:
THEN I should be able to use all of the global features:
Maximize, Minimize
Refresh
Export
Sorting

title: Verify Wireframe
custom_steps: http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=adding_a_row

title: Label field must be populated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Salary Structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks "Add Row"
AND user does not enter anything into the 'Label' field
AND user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN error message appears stating that 'Label' is a required field
AND the row is not saved

title: Verify success/error notifications
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Salary Structures widget
AND user has clicked "Add Row"
AND user has not entered anything into the 'Label' field
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks "Add Row" again
AND enters something into the 'Label' field for this row
AND clicks 'Save'
custom_expected:
THEN an error modal pops up
AND the number of successfully saved structures is given
AND the number of errors
AND a list of errors
AND the user can click "Close" to dismiss

title: Required fields should have red asterisk
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a user is logged in as a club
AND a user can see the Salary Structures widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Row" button
custom_expected: THEN the required column ('Label') should have a red asterisk to the right of the header

title: Errors appear in error column
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Salary Structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks "Add Row"
AND user does not enter anything into the 'Label' field
AND user clicks "Save"
AND user closes the error popup
custom_expected: THEN the rows which produced errors should have an error icon in the error column

title: Clicking the edit icon puts row into edit mode with focus on Label input
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Salary Structures widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks edit icon
custom_expected: THEN the selected row will be put into edit mode with the focus on the 'Label' column

title: Save and Cancel All Changes appear
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Salary Structures widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Edit" icon on a row
custom_expected: THEN user should see the "Save" and "Cancel all Changes" buttons in the lower-right-hand corner of the widget

title: Edit functionality follows edit tables frame work functionality (saving, cancelling)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Salary Structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the edit icon next to a row
AND user types anything into the fields
custom_expected:
THEN user can click "Cancel All Changes" and clear the fields
AND user can click "Save" to save what is entered

title: Label and Salary columns editable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Salary Structures widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the edit icon on a given row
custom_expected: THEN that row's 'Label' and 'Salary' columns are editable

title: Date Modified automatically updates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Salary Structures widget
AND user has clicked the edit icon on a given row
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected: THEN the 'Date Modified' column updates with today's date.

title: Required columns have red asterisk when in edit mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Salary Structures widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the edit icon
custom_expected: THEN a red asterisk will appear next to the header of the 'Label' column

title: Required fields that are not populated trigger hard error on Save
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Salary Structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the edit icon on a given row
AND user leaves one or more required fields blank
AND user clicks "save"
custom_expected:
THEN an error modal appears
AND the fields are not saved

title: On closing error modal, error-free rows save and revert to view mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Salary Structures widget
AND user has edited multiple rows
AND some of the rows do not have all required fields populated
AND at least one of the rows does have all required fields populated
custom_steps:
WHEN when user clicks "Save"
AND dismisses the resulting error modal
custom_expected: THEN the rows which had all required fields populated are saved and in view mode

title: For any rule that checks against a system date, if date is not populated, show hard error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
AND that the Rule 5 system date hasn't passed
AND the Add C defaults to next year has passed
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to tender an Add C in preliminary state
custom_expected: THEN user sees a hard error

custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Salary Structures widget
custom_expected: THEN the delete (trashcan) icon appears in each row

title: Verify confirmation message appears
custom_preconds:

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the delete icon next to a given row
custom_expected: THEN a confirmation message appears

AND user can view the Salary Structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the delete icon next to a given row

AND user clicks "Delete"
custom_expected: THEN a blue notification "1 row deleted" appears

title: Checkmarks in view mode follow proper font, size color etc.
custom_expected: http://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=edit_an_authorized_signatory_negotiator

title: "Duplicate Previous" option is available on "Enter Salary" pop-out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Addendum C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the edit icon for a row
AND user clicks "Enter Salary"
AND user opens the "Salary Structures" dropdown menu
custom_expected: THEN user sees the "Duplicate Previous" option

title: System duplicates player's most recently approved Add C values
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Addendum C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the edit icon for another row
AND user clicks "Enter Salary"
AND user opens the "Salary Structures" dropdown menu
AND user selects "Duplicate Previous"
custom_expected: THEN the previous approved salary structure should be duplicated in the second row

title: Duplication works if multiple Add Cs selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Addendum C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the edit icon for a row
AND user clicks "Enter Salary"
AND user opens the "Salary Structures" dropdown menu
AND user selects a salary structure
WHEN user selects two new rows
AND clicks the edit icon
AND user clicks "Enter Salary"
AND user opens the "Salary Structures" dropdown menu
AND user selects "Duplicate Previous"
custom_expected: THEN the first selected salary structure should be duplicated in the second and third row

title: Blank values duplicated as blanks
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Addendum C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a player with blank values from a previous C
AND selects duplicate previous salary for that player's new C
custom_expected: THEN the new values should duplicate the blank levels of play

title: Pop-out automatically closes after selecting "Duplicate Previous"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Addendum C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row
AND clicks the edit icon
AND user clicks "Enter Salary"
AND user opens the "Salary Structures" dropdown menu
AND user selects "Duplicate Previous"
AND clicks "Apply"
custom_expected: THEN the dropdown menu automatically closes

title: "Add Row" button appears in widget foot

AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_expected: THEN user can see the "Add Row" button at the bottom of the widget

title: Cliking "Add Row" adds a new row in edit mode to the top

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
custom_expected:
THEN a new blank row is added at the top of the widget
AND the focus is on this new row

title: "Save" and "Cancel all Changes" buttons appears

AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
custom_expected: THEN the "Save" and "Cancel all Changes" buttons appear at the bottom of the widget

title: Focus is on Label input
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
custom_expected:
THEN a new blank row is added at the top of the widget
AND the focus in the Label field of this row

title: User is able to tab between fields

AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
AND places the cursor in a field
custom_expected: THEN the user can hit the Tab key and toggle between fields

title: All colums are editable except Date which is set to today
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_expected:
THEN the user can click the edit icon on any row
AND the user can edit any field except Date

title: Label is a free field

GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
custom_expected: THEN user can input any character into the Label field

title: Salary columns are decimal fields which do not accept other characters

GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
custom_expected: THEN the user can only enter decmial values into the salary fields

title: Cancelling changes removes row complete
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
AND user then clicks "Cancel All Changes"
custom_expected: THEN the new row is removed

title: Club is able to save newly added row
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
AND enters a Label
custom_expected:
THEN user can hit "Save"
AND the newly added row will be saved

title: Club is able to add multiple rows and Save or Cancel all Changes at once
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
AND clicks it again
custom_expected:
THEN the user can edit multiple rows
AND hit save or cancel all changes
AND the effect will be applied to all rows

title: On save show blue wirefram as per notification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
AND user clicks "Save"
custom_expected: THEN a blue notification appears "X new salary structures successfully saved"

title: All salary structures saved for club appears in Entere Salary pop-out > Salary Structure dropdown
custom_preconds:

AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters edit mode for one or more rows
AND user clicks "Enter Salary"
AND clicks the "Salary Structures" dropdown menu
custom_expected: THEN user can see all previously created salary structures for that team that are in the salary structures widget

title: Salary sructures are listed alphabetically starting from option 4

GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters edit mode for one or more rows
AND user clicks "Enter Salary"
AND clicks the "Salary Structures" dropdown menu
custom_expected:
THEN user can see all previously created salary structures for that team that are in the salary structures widget
AND all options below option 4 are alphabetically ordered

title: When salary structure is selected it is applied to all selected rows

AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters edit mode for multiple rows
AND user clicks "Enter Salary"
AND clicks the "Salary Structures" dropdown menu
AND selects a salary structure
custom_expected: THEN all selected rows will be populated with the applied salary strucutre

title: Pop-out closes after applying salary structure with affected rows in edit mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters edit mode for a row
AND user clicks "Enter Salary"
AND clicks the "Salary Structures" dropdown menu
AND selects a salary structure
AND Clicks 'Apply'
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdown box should authomatically close
AND the selected row/s are in edit mode

title: Verify any changes made in Salary Structure widget are reflected in Salary structure dropdown when Add C is reloaded
custom_preconds:

AND can view the Add C widget
AND can view the Salary Structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user modifies a salary structure in its widget
THEN user refreshes the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN user can select the edited salary structure and see the reflected changes

title: Verify Date Signed field is editable on Tendered Add Cs while salary fields are not

AND can view the Add c widget
custom_steps: WHEN user enters edit mode for a tendered Add C
custom_expected:
THEN the Date Signed field is editable
AND the salary fields are not

title: Date field should not accept invalid dates or values

AND can view the Add c widget
custom_steps: WHEN user enters edit mode for a tendered Add C
custom_expected: THEN the user can only input valid dates into the Date field

GIVEN that user is logged in as a club

custom_steps:
WHEN user enters edit mode for a tendered Add C

title: Date picker only allows dates from Add C widget year and year prior

custom_steps:

AND the upload takes more than 2 seconds
custom_expected: THEN a loading indicator appears

title: Verify clicking on paperclip opens PDF attachment in a new browser window unless user settings are otherwise
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a paperclip icon
custom_expected: THEN that attachment is opened as a .pdf in a new browser window

title: Ideal behavior: Clicking on subsequent paperclip opens next PDF in same window as previously opened PDFs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on a paperclip icon
AND then clicks on subsequent paperclip icons
custom_expected: THEN the attachments are opened in their own tabs within one separate window

title: Verify the Submit button is enable only if user check off Tendered Add Cs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects one or more rows with attachments
custom_expected: THEN user can only click "Submit" on rows in Tendered status

title: If Tendered C does not have an attachment, show hard error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects one or more rows in Tendered status without attachments
AND user attempts to submit
custom_expected: THEN user receives hard error

title: Verify blue notification " [no.] Add Cs submitted" appears
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects one or more rows with attachments in Tendered state
AND user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected: THEN user will see a blue notification stating the number of Add Cs successfully submitted

title: Verify Add C statuses are updated to pending
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects one or more rows with attachments in Tendered state
AND user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected: THEN the status of those Add Cs will be updated to Pending

title: Pending Cs must be in green font
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN Pending Add Cs will be in a green font

title: Verify all fields are not editable for Pending Cs when logged in as a club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the fields in a Pending Add C are not editable

title: Show hard error when Date Signed field is left blank
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user attempts to submit a Tendered Add C
AND the Date Signed field is left blank
custom_expected:
THEN user receives a hard error
AND Add C is not submitted

title: Verify Business Rule 19.14
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN the system date "Rule 5 draft" is after the current date
AND the user attempts to submit and Add C for the upcoming year
custom_expected: THEN the user sees a hard error and the Add C is not submitted

title: Verify there is a new column called "Stored Signature"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Authorized Signatories widget
custom_expected: http://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=edit_an_authorized_signatory_negotiator

title: For signatories that do not yet have a stored signature, show an ADD button in the column
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Authorized Signatories widget
custom_expected: THEN the user sees an "Add" button in the Stored Signature column for any signatory that does not have a stored signature

title: Add button should include the classes btn-xs btn-default.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is inspecting the "Add Button" element in the signatories and negotiators widget
custom_expected: THEN user will see the class button-xs associated with it

title: Clicking Add should open a modal as shown in wireframe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row
AND user clicks the "Add" button in the Stored Signature column
custom_expected: THEN a wireframe box appears: http://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=add_signature

title: User can draw a signature using mouse or other device
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row
AND user clicks the "Add" button in the Stored Signature column
custom_expected: THEN user can draw in the signature box with a mouse or other device

title: Verify Clear button erases signature
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row
AND user clicks the "Add" button in the Stored Signature column
AND draws a signature in the signature box
AND user clicks "Clear"
custom_expected: THEN the signature will be erased

title: Verify Apply button saves and closes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row
AND user clicks the "Add" button in the Stored Signature column
AND draws a signature in the signature box
AND user clicks "Save"
custom_expected: THEN the signature box will close and the signature will be saved

title: Veirfy Cancel closes modal with no changes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row
AND user clicks the "Add" button in the Stored Signature column
AND draws a signature in the signature box
AND user clicks "Cancel"
custom_expected: THEN the signature box closes and no changes are saved

title: For signatories that already have a stored signature, show an Edit button in the Stored Signature column
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
AND a row in that widget already has a signature
custom_steps: WHEN that row is put into edit mode
custom_expected: THEN that row shows an "Edit" button under the Stored Signatures column

title: Verify that clicking Edit opens modal as per wireframe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN a user puts a row with a stored signature into edit mode
AND clicks the "Edit" button in the stored signatures column
custom_expected: THEN a wireframe box opens: http://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=add_signature

title: User can see their existing signature
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN a user puts a row with a stored signature into edit mode
AND clicks the "Edit" button in the stored signatures column
custom_expected: THEN user can see the previously stored signature in the signature box

title: User can draw a new signature using mouse or other device
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row with a stored signature
AND user clicks the "Edit" button in the Stored Signature column
custom_expected: THEN user can draw in the signature box with a mouse or other device

title: Verify Clear button erases signature
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
AND that user is viewing the edit signature wireframe box
custom_steps: WHEN user hits the "Clear" button
custom_expected: THEN the signature box is erased

title: Verify Apply button saves and closes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row with a stored signature
AND user clicks the "Edit" button in the Stored Signature column
AND draws a signature in the signature box
AND user clicks "Save"
custom_expected: THEN the signature is saved and the box closes

title: Veirfy Cancel closes modal with no changes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row with a stored signature
AND user clicks the "Edit" button in the Stored Signature column
AND draws a signature in the signature box
AND user clicks "Cancel"
custom_expected: THEN the signature box closes with no changes

title: Hitting Clear and Apply deletes the stored signature and you now see ADD button in the stored signature column
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row with a stored signature
AND user puts that row into edit mode
AND user hits "Clear"
AND user clicks "Apply"
custom_expected: THEN the stored signature is deleted

title: A column called 'Club Signatory' is added to the widget to the left of the Country Signed column
custom_expected: http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_-_view_add_cs

title: Verify the column is editable in Preliminary and Tendered states
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the edit icon on an Add C in Preliminary or Tendered state
custom_expected: THEN the Club Signatory column is editable

title: When editable it is a dropdown showing a list of the Org's Authorized signatories
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the edit icon on an Add C in Preliminary or Tendered state
AND the user clicks on the Club Signatory column
custom_expected: THEN the field is editable as a drop down menu

title: Verify the name is displayed as First Last.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the edit icon on an Add C in Preliminary or Tendered state
AND the user clicks on the Club Signatory column
custom_expected: THEN the drop down menu displays the options as "[First name] [Last name]"

title: This field should default to the first name on the list. If there are no names, then default to None
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
AND an Add C in Preliminary or Tendered state is in edit mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on the Club Signatory column
AND does not select an item in the drop down menu
custom_expected: THEN the default selection is the first name, or None if there are no names.

title: Hitting "Save" will save the selection in the DB
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN the user edits the Club Signatory column
AND clicks "Save"
custom_expected: THEN the selection is saved in the database

title: When generating Addendum C PDFs using the Print button, the Name and title sections must be pre-populated by the system on the PDF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Addendum C Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user chooses to export an Add C as a .pdf
custom_expected: THEN the name and title fields for the authorized signatory will be pre-populated on the .pdf

title: The Name must match the chosen Name in the Club Signatory field on the Addendum C widget. It should be in the order "First Last"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
AND at least on of the Add Cs has an Club Signatory saved
custom_steps: WHEN user chooses to export an Add C as a .pdf
custom_expected:
THEN the name fields for will match that of the saved Club Signatory field in the Add C widget
AND the name will be displayed First Last

title: The Title must match the entered title in the Authorized Signatory widget for the chosen Name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
AND at least on of the Add Cs has an Club Signatory saved
AND that club signatory appears in the Authorized Signatory widget
custom_steps: WHEN user chooses to export Add C as a .pdf
custom_expected: THEN the title for the authorized signatory must match that of the entry for the same name in the Authorized Signatory widget
